ija.homework3.board

Class MazeBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • ija.homework3.board.MazeBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MazeBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a playing board which consists of playing fields MazeField.
    Author:
    Norbert Durcansky (xdurca01)
    Jan Jusko (xjusko00)
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • createMazeBoard

        public static MazeBoard createMazeBoard(int n)
        This method calls the constructor of the class and creates a MazeBoard of size n as well as generates appropriate number of MazeFields to add them to the board.
        Parameters:
        n - Size of board
        Returns:
        MazeBoard

      • newGame

        public void newGame(int K)
        Method creates a new game by creating a new card pack and places all the cards on fields. All has to be done according to rules of game, so lots of conditions inside. Also generates one free card.
        Parameters:
        K - Number of Cards to be created.

      • shiftinit

        public void shiftinit(int l,
                      int k,
                      MazeCard kamen)
        Method does the initial rotation before initializing the game. Rotate the card before game according to the rules.
        Parameters:
        l - Number of rows
        k - Number of cols
        kamen - Card to be rotated

      • get

        public MazeField get(int r,
                     int c)
        Simple getter of MazeField. Return a field from board on specific position.
        Parameters:
        r - Row
        c - Col
        Returns:
        MazeField

      • getFreeCard

        public MazeCard getFreeCard()
        Get current free card.
        Returns:
        MazeCard

      • max

        public int max(int L,
               int I,
               int T)
        Return specific integer according to maximum value of parameters. Return 0,1,2 according to which one of the parameters is maximum.
        Parameters:
        L - int
        I - int
        T - int
        Returns:
        int

      • shift

        public void shift(MazeField mf,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> undo,
                  boolean backtrack)
        Method responsible for Shifting the fields through the board. Method takes the field and shifts it into the board on specific position. There is need to do several assertions.
        Parameters:
        mf - MazeField
        undo - String of past game steps
        backtrack - boolean value, if want to go back
